__e: Mm, that is dangerous work, and when you return... you will be rewarded for your service.
Let me say only that I am proud and happy, and that I regard this great honor not so much as an award for what I have achieved, but as a standard to hold against what I have yet to accomplish.
They told me you've been behaving very well.
Have you ever received an award like that?
Sure. But my dad never won an award, and he was always happy.
He was one of the biggest criminals in history.
